message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the quality of the product. I'm willing to go up to $100, but I'm not sure I can go higher. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm confident this product is worth more. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
